aadProfile.description: AAD profile for the provisioned cluster.

enableRbac.description: EnableRBAC - Whether to enable Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control.

linuxProfile.description: LinuxProfile - The profile for Linux VMs in the Provisioned Cluster.

features.description: Additional features specs like Arc Agent Onboarding.

arcAgentProfile.description: Arc agentry configuration for the provisioned cluster.

kubernetesVersion.description: KubernetesVersion - Version of Kubernetes specified when creating the managed cluster.

agentPoolProfiles.description: The agent pools of the cluster.

cloudProviderProfile.description: The underlying cloud infra provider properties.

featuresStatus.description: Additional features status like Arc Agent Onboarding.

arcAgentStatus.description: Defines the observed Arc Agent status that is resourceSynced back to the ARM resource.

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage - Error messages during creation of cluster

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of cluster actuation. E.g. Pending, Running, Terminating, Failed etc.

status.description: HybridAKSClusterStatus defines the observed state of HybridAKSCluster

securityProfile.description: The security profile for the provisioned cluster.

oidcIssuerProfile.description: The OIDC issuer profile of the provisioned cluster.

licenseProfile.description: The license profile of the provisioned cluster.

provisionedClustersProperties.description: All properties of the provisioned cluster

identity.description: The identity of the provisioned cluster.

provisionedClustersListResult.description: A list of provisioned clusters resources.

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage will be set in the event that there is a terminal problem reconciling the AddOn and will contain a more verbose string suitable for logging and human consumption.

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of cluster actuation. E.g. Pending, Running, Terminating, Failed etc.

count.description: Count - Number of agents to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

availabilityZones.description: AvailabilityZones - The list of Availability zones to use for nodes. Datacenter racks modelled as zones

vmSize.description: VmSize - The size of the agent pool VMs.

name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

NamedAgentPoolProfile.description: Agent pool profile along with a name parameter

errorMessage.description: ErrorMessage - Error messages during creation of cluster

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of cluster actuation. E.g. Pending, Running, Terminating, Failed etc.

readyReplicas.description: Total number of ready machines targeted by this deployment.

replicas.description: Total number of non-terminated machines targeted by this deployment

status.description: Defines the observed state of the agent pool

agentPoolProvisioningStatus.description: The agentPool resource provisioning status definition

agentPoolListResult.description: A list of agent pool resources.

AADProfile.description: AAD Profile specifies attributes for Azure Active Directory integration.

adminGroupObjectIDs.description: The list of AAD group object IDs that will have admin role of the cluster.

enableAzureRbac.description: Whether to enable Azure RBAC for Kubernetes authorization.

tenantID.description: The AAD tenant ID to use for authentication. If not specified, will use the tenant of the deployment subscription.

workloadIdentity.description: Workload identity settings for the security profile. Workload identity enables Kubernetes applications to access Azure cloud resources securely with Azure AD.

ProvisionedClusterSecurityProfile.description: The security profile for the provisioned cluster.

enabled.description: Whether the workload identity is enabled.

ProvisionedClusterSecurityProfileWorkloa.description: The workload identity profile of the provisioned cluster.

issuerURL.description: The OIDC issuer url of the provisioned cluster.

enabled.description: Whether the OIDC issuer is enabled.

ProvisionedClusterOIDCIssuerProfile.description: The OIDC issuer profile of the provisioned cluster.

azureHybridBenefit.description: Indicates whether Azure Hybrid Benefit is opted in

ProvisionedClusterLicenseProfile.description: The license profile of the provisioned cluster.

LinuxProfile.description: LinuxProfile - Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

keyData.description: KeyData - Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

publicKeys.description: PublicKeys - The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs. Only expect one key specified.

ssh.description: SSH - SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

LinuxProfileProperties.description: LinuxProfile - Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

networkPolicy.description: NetworkPolicy - Network policy used for building Kubernetes network. Possible values include: 'calico', 'flannel'. Default is 'calico'

podCidr.description: PodCidr - A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign pod IPs when kubenet is used.

ControlPlaneEndpointProfile.description: controlPlaneEndpoint - API server endpoint for the control plane

controlPlaneEndpoint.description: API server endpoint for the control plane

hostIP.description: Host IP address for API server

ControlPlaneProfile.description: ControlPlaneProfile - The control plane properties for the provisioned cluster.

CloudProviderProfile.description: CloudProviderProfile - The underlying cloud infra provider properties.

infraNetworkProfile.description: InfraNetworkProfile - List of infra network profiles for the provisioned cluster

vnetSubnetIds.description: Array of references to azure resource corresponding to the Network object e.g. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.AzureStackHCI/logicalNetworks/{logicalNetworkName}

ArcAgentProfile.description: Defines the Arc Agent properties for the Provisioned clusters.

agentVersion.description: Version of the Arc agents to be installed on the provisioned Provisioned cluster resource

agentAutoUpgrade.description: Indicates whether the Arc agents on the provisioned clusters be upgraded automatically to the latest version. Defaults to Enabled.

ArcAgentStatus.description: Defines the observed Arc Agent status that is resourceSynced back to the ARM resource.

deploymentState.description: Observed deployment state of the Arc Agents on the target cluster. Possible values include: 'pending', 'provisioning', 'provisioning {HelmChartInstalled}', 'provisioning {MSICertificateDownloaded}', 'provisioned', 'deleting', 'failed', 'upgrading'

errorMessage.description: Error messages while onboarding/upgrading/uninstalling the Arc agents

onboardingPublicKey.description: Onboarding public key for provisioning the Managed identity for the HybridAKS cluster. Will be used to create the hybridIdentityMetadata proxy resource and will not be persisted.

agentVersion.description: Version of the Arc agents currently running on the Provisioned cluster resource.

coreCount.description: Number of CPU cores present in the Provisioned cluster resource

lastConnectivityTime.description: Last connected timestamp of the Provisioned cluster resource.

principalId.description: The principal id of provisioned cluster identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the provisioned cluster. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: The type of identity used for the provisioned cluster. The type SystemAssigned, includes a system created identity. The type None means no identity is assigned to the provisioned cluster.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

resourceUid.description: Unique id of the parent provisioned cluster resource.

publicKey.description: Onboarding public key for provisioning the Managed identity for the HybridAKS cluster.

identity.description: The identity of the provisioned cluster.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of hybridIdentityMetadata.

KubernetesVersionProfileList.description: A list of kubernetes version resources.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

KubernetesVersionProfileProperties.description: Kubernetes version profile for given major.minor release

isPreview.description: Whether this version is in preview mode.

patchVersions.description: Patch versions of a Kubernetes release

upgrades.description: Possible upgrade path for given patch version

KubernetesSupportPlan.description: Different support tiers for AKS managed clusters

values.description: Support for the version is the same as for the open source Kubernetes offering. Official Kubernetes open source community support versions for 1 year after release.

values.description: Array of HybridAKS Support VM Skus

resourceType.description: The resource type of the vm

capabilities.description: A name value pair to describe the specific vm's capability

name.description: The name of the VM Family

tier.description: The tier of the VM Family

size.description: The size of the VM Family

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity

upgrades.description: List of orchestrator types and versions available for upgrade.

isPreview.description: Whether the Kubernetes version is currently in preview.

controlPlaneProfile.description: The list of available upgrade versions for the control plane.

agentPoolProfiles.description: The list of available upgrade versions for agent pools.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

properties.description: The properties of the upgrade profile.

ProvisionedClusterUpgradeProfile.description: The list of available upgrades for compute pools.

OSType.description: OsType - OsType to be used to specify os type. Choose from Linux and Windows. Default to Linux. Possible values include: 'Linux', 'Windows'

values.description: Use Mariner as the OS for node images.
Use Windows2019 as the OS for node images.
Use Windows2022 as the OS for node images.

OSSKU.description: Specifies the OS SKU used by the agent pool. The default is CBLMariner if OSType is Linux. The default is Windows2019 when OSType is Windows.
